description: Display data from  Proxmox hosts, Qdevice node,  Guest machines, and environmental measurements.

targets.query: SELECT ("usage_idle" -100)*-1 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'arbiter') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last(uptime) AS "uptime" FROM "system" WHERE (("object" = 'lxc') OR ("object" = 'qemu')) AND ("nodename" = 'pve') AND time > (now() - 10m) AND uptime > 0 GROUP BY "host" limit 1
SELECT last("used")/last("total") FROM "system" WHERE ("nodename" = 'pve') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "nodename", "host"
SELECT "value" FROM "autogen"."°C" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'pve_cpu_temperature') AND $timeFilter

SELECT "temp" FROM "autogen"."temp" WHERE (("sensor" =~ /.input/ AND "sensor" !~ /.pch/ AND "sensor" !~ /.auxtin/ AND "sensor" !=  'acpitz_input' AND "sensor" !~ /._core/ AND "sensor" !~ /.skylake/ AND "sensor" !~ /.peciagent/) OR "sensor" = 'soc_thermal') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "sensor"
SELECT "temp_c" FROM "smart_device" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "device"
SELECT "download_bandwidth"*8, "upload_bandwidth"*8, "ping_latency" FROM "Speedtest" WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Rx", non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Tx" FROM "nics" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "instance" = 'enp2s0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Rx", non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Tx" FROM "nics" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "instance" = 'enp2s0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Rx", non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Tx" FROM "nics" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "instance" = 'enp2s0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Rx", non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Tx" FROM "nics" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "instance" = 'enp2s0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Rx", non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Tx" FROM "nics" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "instance" = 'enp2s0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Rx", non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Tx" FROM "nics" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "instance" = 'enp2s0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(uptime) AS "uptime" FROM "system" WHERE (("object" = 'lxc') OR ("object" = 'qemu')) AND ("nodename" = 'pve-lite') AND time > (now() - 10m) AND uptime > 0 GROUP BY "host" limit 1
SELECT last("used")/last("total") FROM "system" WHERE ("nodename" = 'pve-lite') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "nodename", "host"
SELECT ((max("nominal_power")* max("load_percent"))/100) FROM "autogen"."apcupsd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT max("battery_charge_percent") FROM "apcupsd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Rx", non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Tx" FROM "nics" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "instance" = 'enp2s0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
